casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Kasey Lee NIPPER. No. 346PA06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 5, 2006. David Childers, Mount Holly, for Nipper. Sandra Wallace-Smith, Assistant Attorney General, James C. Gaither, Jr., District Attorney, for State of NC. Prior report: ___ N.C.App. ___, 629 S.E.2d 883 .

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 3rd day of July 2006 by Defendant in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th day of October 2006."

Therefore the case is docketed as of the date of this order's certification. Briefs of the respective parties shall be submitted to this Court within the times allowed and in the manner provided by Appellate Rule 15(g)(2).
